finder.query: WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND FRT_CHRG_METH_CD = ?frtChrgMethCd01? AND FRT_CHRG_TO_CD = ?frtChrgToCd01? AND SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = ?shipToCustCd01?
